description:
Welcome little Thea Marie. This cute Latina looks really good in a ball gag, almost too good.
There's not much to say that the photos don't already show- we put heavy weights on her nipples, we make her cum over and over, and we kick away the foot supports so she is made to hang and slowly suffer.
She is just so responsive, cute, and willing to suffer for us it hurts the heart. She will be back.
title: Thea Marie
